section.name: HOST PATHS
section._desc: Configure kernel, rootfs, and temporary paths on the host system

path.name: atari_kernel_path
path._tooltip: Path to the Atari Kernel/ROM file (e.g., MAGICLIN.OS)

folder.name: atari_rootfs_path
folder._tooltip: Path to the host directory containing the root filesystem of the emulation

bool.name: atari_h_home
bool._tooltip: If enabled, mounts the host home directory (~/) as U:/home inside the emulation

bool.name: atari_h_rdonly
bool._tooltip: Mounts the host home directory as read-only. Requires 'Mount $HOME...' to be enabled

bool.name: atari_m_host_root
bool._tooltip: If enabled, mounts the host root directory (/) for full system access

bool.name: atari_m_host_root_rdonly
bool._tooltip: Mounts the host root directory as read-only. Requires 'Mount Host Root Path' to be enabled

folder.name: atari_temp_path
folder._tooltip: Host directory used by the emulation for temporary files

section.name: HOST DEVICES
section._desc: Set the host device paths for serial communication and printing

string.name: atari_print_cmd
string._tooltip: Command or device path used to handle printing output from the emulation

path.name: atari_serial_dev_path
path._tooltip: Path to the host serial device (e.g., /dev/ttyS0) for serial communication

section.name: ATARI SCREEN
section._desc: Adjust the Atari screen resolution, refresh rate, scaling, and mouse hiding

int.name: atari_screen_width
int._tooltip: The display resolution in pixels for the Atari screen window

int.name: atari_screen_height
int._tooltip: The display resolution in pixels for the Atari screen window

int.name: atari_screen_stretch_x
int._tooltip: Horizontal scaling factor (1 = normal, 2 = double width, etc.)

int.name: atari_screen_stretch_y
int._tooltip: Vertical scaling factor (1 = normal, 2 = double height, etc

int.name: atari_screen_rate_hz
int._tooltip: Target screen refresh rate in Hertz (Hz)

choice.name: atari_screen_colour_mode
choice._tooltip: Select the color depth or graphics mode used for the screen

bool.name: hide_host_mouse
bool._tooltip: Hides the host operating system's mouse pointer when it is over the emulation window

bool.name: relative_mouse
bool._tooltip: Tells SDL to send relative mouse movements

section.name: SCREEN PLACEMENT
section._desc: Define the window's position (X/Y) and which display it should appear on

int.name: app_display_number
int._tooltip: The display number (e.g., 0, 1, 2) on which the window should appear

int.name: app_window_x
int._tooltip: Window position coordinates relative to the top-left corner of the screen

int.name: app_window_y
int._tooltip: Window position coordinates relative to the top-left corner of the screen

section.name: ATARI EMULATION
section._desc: General emulation settings, including RAM size, language ROM, and menu behavior

int.name: atari_memory_size
int._tooltip: Amount of RAM allocated to the emulated system (e.g., 8MB, 32MB)

choice.name: atari_language
choice._tooltip: Selects the language ROM to be used by the emulation (affects keyboard layout and startup language)

choice.name: gui_language
choice._tooltip: Selects the language for this application

bool.name: show_host_menu
bool._tooltip: If enabled, the host menu bar (File, View, Help, etc.) is visible

bool.name: atari_autostart
bool._tooltip: If enabled, the emulation starts immediately upon application launch

bool.name: show_tooltips
bool._tooltip: Toggle help tooltips for all widgets

section.name: ADDITIONAL ATARI DRIVES
section._desc: Manage additional mounted host folders or disk image files (A-Z) for the emulation

section.name: ETH0
section._desc: Configure network settings for the emulated Ethernet device (ETH0)

choice.name: eth0_type
choice._tooltip: Select the Ethernet emulation mode (e.g., Disabled, TAP/Tunnel)

string.name: eth0_tunnel
string._tooltip: The host's virtual network interface name (e.g., tap0)

string.name: eth0_host_ip
string._tooltip: The IP address of the Host's side of the virtual link

string.name: eth0_atari_ip
string._tooltip: The IP address assigned to the emulated Atari device

string.name: eth0_netmask
string._tooltip: The network mask for the virtual subnet

string.name: eth0_gateway
string._tooltip: The gateway IP address (usually the host IP)

string.name: eth0_mac
string._tooltip: The unique MAC address for the emulated device

int.name: eth0_intlevel
int._tooltip: The interrupt level used by the emulated device (4 is standard)
